title: Project creation should confirm the ability to scrub the bin directory
description: When creating a new project, there should be a confirmation process to ensure that the bin directory can be successfully scrubbed later on.
OB: Currently, there is no confirmation process or indication that the bin directory can be scrubbed after project creation.
EB: After project creation, there should be a prompt or notification confirming that the bin directory can be scrubbed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
 1. Create a new project. 
Expected behavior: 
 A confirmation process or notification should be displayed, indicating the ability to scrub the bin directory after project creation.
